result.title: Pinnacle West Capital: Buy-The-Dip Opportunity For Dividends And Growth
result.text: Pinnacle West Capital offers a 4.1% yield and strong growth prospects, driven by Arizona's population and industrial expansion. PNW benefits from robust demand growth, especially from data centers and semiconductor facilities, supporting long-term EPS growth. Favorable regulatory developments, including a proposed rate increase and wildfire liability protections, enhance PNW's investment appeal.
